scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test riteway -r @babel/register -r regenerator-runtime -r ignore-styles src/**/*.test.js src/**/*.test.jsx
scripts.test:dev: NODE_ENV=test riteway -r @babel/register -r regenerator-runtime -r ignore-styles src/tests.dev.js | tap-color && echo 'Test pass.'
scripts.test:watch: chokidar src/**/*.test.js src/**/*.test.jsx -c "clear && yarn run -s test:dev" --initial --silent
